column4: Bah. I guess I took it off when I was trying to get rid of Gnome flash player
I am the one and only user
Ya, when I tell it to print it prints
I have no clue what you're talking
what's the brand name of the printer/scanner?
Cannon Pixima MP750      Dr_Willis: It worked before, I think I touched something and screwed it up
you can try starting xsane from terminal with sudo .. ie... sudo xsane .. this is a common theme with scanners and xsane for some reason..
Same thing when I click the icon
Icon?  the xsane icon in the menu's?
that's not what I asked you to test.. go to Applications>Accessories>Terminal and in the box that opens type .. sudo xsane
ok.. just a thought.. I have to use my Brother all in one that way for some reason.. good luck
